attributes.action: commit not to change the dates on which Summer Time applies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The USA has recently changed the dates on which Summer Time (Daylight Savings Time) applies.  This has created huge, unnecessary problems with automated systems that have the old rules for the dates programmed in.  Many buildings now have heating coming on at the wrong time of day, for example.

We ask the PM to confirm that this problem will never be introduced into the UK.
